skins.shipDescription: Leander-class light cruiser ®C Achilles, Hull Number 70!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm the second ship of Leander class ships, Achilles. My name is from the war god Achilles who fought in Troy~ That~ is~ why~, I'm gonna kick my enemies' butts no matter who they are~°Ó
skins.acquisition: Leander class light cruiser number 2, A~chil~les~ is here~ Commander, want to buy snacks in New Zealand?
skins.login: Commander, Commander, don't pronounce my name wrong again~ I'm Achilles - remember that? Remember that? It's A-chil-les~°Ó
skins.details: Eh? Me liking potatoes... does not match with my image?!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Com~man~der! What is that delicious looking thing?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Al~right~ Then I'm eating the butter~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Oww-- I cannot move my head or body anymore~ I don't want to do anything for a month~
skins.secretaryTouch: OK, I got it now~ Commander is an idiot!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hey, hey, wha~t are you looking for?

skins.shipDescription: The cute and charming Achilles is Super°ÓRetro°ÓFitted! Even my heel won't give me any problems now! Well, not like it really ever did before, ahaha~°Ó
skins.acquisition: The cute and charming Achilles is Super°ÓRetro°ÓFitted! Even my heel won't give me any problems now! Well, not like it really ever did before, ahaha~°Ó
skins.login: Commander, want some honey? It's heckin' yummy~!
skins.details: Look, Commander! There's a gorgeous sheila in the sky! ... Really? You believed that?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Being here now, I can chat with anyone whenever! Stoked as a stove, I am!°Ó
skins.secretaryIdle3: You trying to hide some good chow from me? C'mon, let me have a taste!°Ó
skins.secretaryTouch: Let's go and sail off into the sunset! Strewth, this is what being a teeny's all about, eh~
